name: Picture Maker - Puzzle Games
description:
Put your imagination to the test with this brand new picture puzzle! Create pictures by dragging elements of existing pictures together - you need to be creative to complete the puzzle and make what is being asked for! Fun for all of the family and a great way to give your brain workout!

GAME FEATURES

• Create a new picture by dragging parts of the existing pictures together.
• Be creative to complete the puzzle. • Exciting puzzles, fun for all ages.
• Hundreds of games available - keep playing and try to beat your score until you lose your lives.
• A great way to exercise and train your brain.
• Great for kids, teens and adults - fun games for all of the family.
• Great for brain training and to improve problem solving and focus.

Play Picture Maker now for free!
